body_content.explanation: behaviour in which someone shows a sexual interest in an object, or in a part of the body other than the sexual organs:
examples: Foot fetishism has little to do with procreation.
She found out her husband had called a phone sex-line specializing in fetishism.

body_content.explanation: behaviour in which someone has so much interest in an object or activity that they spend an unreasonable amount of time thinking about it or doing it:
examples: There is a fetishism for sport in our society.
He believes that shoe fetishism is almost ubiquitous among women.

body_content.explanation: in some societies, the act of worshipping an object because it is believed to have a spirit or special magical powers:
examples: Their fetishism was less a worship of various things than a use of the objects as charms and protections.
The temple illustrates the animal fetishism that lies at the dark roots of Egyptian religion.
